attributes.action: stop all non Eu Immigration into this country from 1/1/10 to 31/12/11 and to review the consequences following this period.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would have a three fold effect, firstly it would help decrease unemployment within the country, secondly it would allow the UKBA to concentrate all its efforts on dealing with all its various backlogs including outstanding cases, removals, etc and finally the review woulld allow astcok take of what this country really needs form its population and the give a pointer to the infrastructure we should be building for our countries future instead of flying by the seat of our pants
